name: Traversal
description:
Traversal is a game about doing the same thing over and over, but with a twist each time. Follow the golden prize through an ever changing field of obstacles, enemies, and power-ups. Race against the clock and your environment to see how far you can push it. Discover INTESNSE Mode, where you may be challenged by a powerful nemesis.

EPILEPSY WARNING - some flashing colors and screen shake.

Developed in Unity for Windows and Mac.

Version 1.2 is here! Featuring a complete visual overhaul and some gameplay tweaks!
